  • Uses of Action in game

    Subclasses of Action in game 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  AttackAction
    Special Action for attacking other Actors.
    class  ChantingAction  
    class  CraftAction  
    class  DieAction
    this class represents the suicide action of player in every turn(quit game)
    class  DropAction
    it is an action class which represents the action which a zombie does when it has one or two arms
    class  EatFoodAction
    Action for human to eat food from their inventory.
    class  FertilizeAction
    Action for humans to fertilize crop objects they are currently standing on.
    class  HarvestAction
    Action for humans to harvest crop objects adjacent to them.
    class  ReloadAction
    Action class that reloads an Ammo object into a RangedWeapon's barrel.
    class  ShotgunAimMenuAction
    Action class that gives the Player options to shoot their shotgun in a direction.
    class  ShotgunShootAction
    Action class that gets all the player's exit's x and y coordinates and passes them onto a ShotgunAimMenuAction object.
    class  SniperRifleAimAction
    Action class that gets all the actors x and y coordinates on the GameMap and passes them onto a SniperRifleAimMenuAction object.
    class  SniperRifleAimMenuAction
    Action class that gives the Player options to aim at any actor currently on the GameMap.
    class  SniperRifleShootAction
    Action class that gets all the actors x and y coordinates on the GameMap and passes them onto a SniperRifleShootMenuAction object.
    class  SniperRifleShootMenuAction
    Action class that gives the Player options to aim at any actor currently on the GameMap.
    class  SowAction
    Action for farmers to sow a new crop object onto a patch of dirt near the farmer.
    class  SpecialAction  
    class  TransfterAction  
    class  ZombieExpressionAction  
    Methods in game that return Action 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Action AttackBehaviour.getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    Returns an AttackAction that attacks an adjacent attackable Actor.
    Action Behaviour.getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    A factory for creating actions.
    Action ChantingBehaviour.getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)  
    Action DropBehaviour.getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    if the zombie has one arm, with probability of 50% of the turns, the zombie will drop the weapon which it is holding and if the zombies has no arms, in every turns the zombie will drop the weapon which it is holding
    Action EatFoodBehaviour.getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    Returns an EatFoodAction that removes the food object from human's inventory and heals the human by the amount that the food heals by.
    Action EscapeBehaviour.getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)  
    Action FertilizeBehaviour.getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    Returns a FertilizeAction that fertilizes a crop on the actor's location in the GameMap.
    Action FollowBehaviour.getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)  
    Action HarvestBehaviour.getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    Returns a HarvestAction that removes the crop object from the GameMap and either drops a new food object onto the ground or adds the food object into the player's inventory.
    Action HuntBehaviour.getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)  
    Action PickUpBehaviour.getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)  
    Action SowBehaviour.getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    Returns a SowAction that puts a new crop object onto the GameMap after checking whether the space is valid or not.
    Action WanderBehaviour.getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    Returns a MoveAction to wander to a random location, if possible.
    Action ZombieExpressionBehaviour.getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
